attributes.action: stop the destruction of Warren Wood and the construction of Centre Parcs in Bedfordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mid Bedfordshire is a small rural area. The building of a Centre Parcs in Warren Wood would be on green belt land, remove right of way through a popular wood and place unaceptable pressure on local roads and infrastructure. The local council and independant inspector believed it shouldn't be built on green belt land but the Secretary of State overturned the councils decision.
